column1: Local Foods////This is a great lunch spot! They have lots of really delicious and fresh items on the menu. I came here with my sister
column2: Dad and step mom. We ordered the steak sandwich
column3: avocado toast and the crispy chicken sandwich. All of our food was so delicious
column4: and the sides were great as well! I loved the handmade kettle chips! And we tried a pecan chocolate chip cookie and the vegan brownie and both were really good!
